com.opower.hadoop.hbase.query
Interface Query

All Superinterfaces:
Closeable
All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultQuery
public interface Query
extends Closeable

Encapsulates the configuration for and exposes the behavior for a query that will be run against HBase

Author:
jeff@opower.com

Method Detail

scan

ResultScanner scan()
                   throws IOException
Run a scan query against HBase

Returns:
the results of the scan
Throws:
IOException - in case of RPC badness

setTimestamp

Query setTimestamp(String parameter,
                   long timestamp)
Set a timestamp parameter that corresponds to a named parameter in the raw query

Parameters:
parameter - the name of a parameter in the query
timestamp - the timestamp value to use for the parameter
Returns:
this, so that you can chain
